title.en: Due To A Mix-up At The Hotel, Two Coworkers End Up Sharing A Room On A Business Trip

synopsis:
Douki-chan tries to take advantage of the mix-up on a business trip to seduce a coworker she likes.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: My coworker and I were in the elevator together and then we were trapped inside together

synopsis:
Douki-chan and the coworker she likes are trapped in the elevator together. Can she use this opportunity to get closer to him?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: The Junior Who Gives Chocolate On Valentine's Day At Work

synopsis:
Douki-chan makes chocolates for the coworker she likes, but her Junior steals him away.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: My Coworker Who Came Back To Pick Up What He Left Behind

synopsis:
Douki-kun comes back to the restaurant and sees that Douki-chan has fallen asleep. He helps her get home, and then...?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: I will serve you on my hands and knees, Senpai

synopsis:
March 14th is White Day, when men who received chocolates on Valentine's Day are supposed to give back thank-you gifts. Douki-chan is hopeful that she'll get one from Douki-kun.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: My Coworker Who Received An Embarrassing Selfie

synopsis:
Douki-chan accidentally sends her cosplay selfie to Douki-kun. Out of embarrassment, she calls in sick. But she gets this weird feeling and decides to go to work.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: A Coworker Who Goes All-Out With Seductive Lingerie

synopsis:
Douki-chan puts on the best lingerie to tell Douki-kun how she really feels. However, another unexpected rival shows up.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: They Clash!! The Junior Coworker VS The Business Client Senpai!

synopsis:
Dinner with Douki-kun has now turned into drinking with Douki-chan's rivals. But Douki-kun pulls her aside to be alone with her.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

After Douki-chan's attempt to tell her feelings to Douki-kun was interrupted, she wakes up the next morning naked, and not alone.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: A Coworker Who's Excited About A Poolside Date

synopsis:
Douki-chan and Douki-kun receive free tickets to the luxurious hotel pool. Douki-chan shows up in a new swimsuit, and waiting for her at the pool are Douki-kun and...?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: It Finally Bears Fruit!! Good For You, Douki-Chan

synopsis:
Douki-chan and Douki-kun are at a wedding, and some guys hit on Douki-chan.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: That's What I'm Talking About, Douki-Kun

synopsis:
Douki-kun whisks Douki-chan away from the guys who are hitting on her. Then Douki-chan performs in her maid costume.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
